products.title: Rimini Black - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini in black is a classic jet black, rich in both depth and clarity of colour. Yet the fabric is still lightweight enough that it won't block out all of the light from the great outdoors. Ideal for an upstairs bedroom where a good night sleep is a must, the rimini black can serve as a bold new take on a coloured feature wall, or alternatively can be coupled and offset with a range of off-whites and greys to provide a very sleek and modern feel to a bedroom.

products.title: Stockholm Duck Egg Roller Blind
products.description: Their stockholm duck egg roller blind is a beautiful light blue, green colour. So subtle in colour it works perfectly with natural and wooden tones throughout the home. The fabric is moisture restitance making it a 'go to' for kitchens and bathrooms. This lovely, blue blind also comes with 5 year guarantee as standard, giving you peace of mind that you blind is built to last. products.title: Genesis Black Roller Blind
products.description: The genesis black roller blind makes the perfect finishing touch to a modern, monochrome scheme. The practical roller design with its sleek lines and black fabric looks smart and stands out against white for an overall effect that is eye-catching yet minimalist. The lightweight dimout fabric creates a stylish window covering that offers privacy when required without dominating your space. products.title: Oslo Blackout Black Roller Blind
products.description: Simple, bold and cohesive, their oslo blackout black roller blind blends minimal style with practical design. A firm favourite, their oslo blackout fabrics come in a wide array of colours and blind types to suit any room - whether its blackout roller blinds in the bedroom, in the kitchen or study, these blackout fabrics are durable and value for money. At swift direct blind, quality comes first. Their roller blinds are expertly cut and assembled by their roller blinds team, with over 50 years of making blinds and curtains, not only do their blinds come with a quality finish, we provide a free five year guarantee on this product.

products.title: Stirlo Onyx Black
products.description: Stirloonyx black plain roller blind the stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room. The fabric is composed of 100% polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with white chain used as standard, or a nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing.

products.title: Rimini (Blackout) Black - Roller Blind
products.description: The rimini (blackout) in black is simplicity at its best; the combination of the delicately textured blackout fabric with the classic and cool black hue makes this blind functional, stylish, and striking. The rimini black is perfect for any bedroom where the sole aim is the best nights sleep possible. Not one for the faint-hearted, this blind will make a statement in whichever room it's used, giving a particularly sleek yet moody look to any living room or dining room.

products.title: Unicolour Fr Black Roller Blind
products.description: Chic & perfect for making a statement, jet is the perfect shade for contemporary interiors. Light filtering & resistent to moisture. Their stunning unicolour range has been designed specifically with office & work environments in mind. The collection includes everything from subtle muted shades to well satured bright colour options. products.title: Voile Jet Black Roller Blind
products.description: Their voile range of fabrics create a natural feature of the rooms natural light, and are fantatic at creating some privacy without sacrificing light. This stylish bold, black coloured screen fabric, in its daring colour and clean finish, creates a centre point of your window. At swift direct blinds, quality is important to us, which is why this black blind is not only made by their expert team in the heart of yorkshire, but comes with customer-first service and guarantees.

This simple solution for dressing any window will have maximum effect thanks to the striking dark colour and impressive blackout function. The blackout fabric is ideal for blocking out light, keeping in warmth and aiding in easy sleeping. products.title: Screenview Black/black Roller Blind
products.description: Their screenview roller blinds, are a set of flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics, made from a pvc/polyester fabric which are perfect for temperature control in offices and hot rooms. This black roller blind is perfect for blocking out the heat and harmful uv rays from your room, keeping the core room temperature down, a must for any modern environment. These magic screen blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let anybody outside see in.

products.title: Palate Black Coal Roller Blind
products.description: The palate blackout roller blind range is a great option for bedrooms due to the blackout fabric blocking all light from passing through the fabric. With a range of colour to choose from in this range, you'll find a perfect match for your room. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Being fully blackout this fabric is perfect for privacy as it will prevent any light from passing through the material.

products.title: Chatsworth Black
products.description: Chatsworth black made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Palermo (Blackout) Black - Roller Blind
products.description: The blackest of blacks, the palermo (blackout) black is not for shy and retiring rooms. This is a blind that wants to stand out and be noticed, and noticed it certainly will be. With the latest blackout technology, this blind is a must for a night-time feel all day long. Create a moody focal point in a home office or dining room by adding the palermo black to a monochrome colour scheme, and accessorise with bright red or hot fuchsia if you can't resist a little colour.

products.title: Roma (Fr) Ebony - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the bold and contemporary roma (fr) in ebony within a modern or commercial surrounding for a touch of brooding colour with distinctive character. This elegant and nimble blind holds beneficial, practical qualities, with its simple rolling mechanism and flame-retardant fabric. Combine the ebony with a distinctive blend of fuschia and teal fabrics, forming a contemporary palette with bright and alluring colours.

products.title: Affinity Black - Roller Blind
products.description: The affinity blind in black is a lightly patterned fabric that offers great protection from the outside light, whilst still providing style and elegance. The easy-to-use roller-blind is durable, lightweight, and high quality; everything one looks for in a home blind. The delicate patterning of the affinity black looks can add interest to monochrome dcor schemes, where blacks, greys, and whites win the day.

products.title: Origin (Blackout) Ebony - Roller Blind
products.description: Blinds don't get much more blackout than the darkest of dark shade of the origin (blackout) in ebony. This ultra-black blind has a sleek, quality finish to its fabric, and its well-made rolling mechanism make it long-lasting and simple to use. We all know that black goes with anything, but to really make the ebony pop, set it against reds and whites for a modern-chic style living room or dining room.

products.title: Gibson Jet Black Roller Blind
products.description: The rich gibson jet black is a deep, pure black colour. Use this in lighter rooms or pair in with other black furniture. Don't be scared of the dark. The thicker pvc fabric makes this a 100% waterproof blind - perfect for the bathroom. Looking for something a little stronger? This fabric is fully waterproof so can withstand a full drenching without any issues. Ideal for installing in a bathroom or right next to the shower.

products.title: Sketch Noir
products.description: Sketch noir made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Ex-lite Black
products.description: Ex-lite black made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Preto Black
products.description: Preto black made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Sundown Black
products.description: Sundown black made to measure roller blind.

products.title: Veil Noir Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The veil noir voile blind has a destinctive stripe running down the fabric which is a plain smooth finish. This is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Pura Noir Voile Roller Blind
products.description: The pura noir voile roller blind is a great way to add character to your window without compromising on the light. With a soft texture to it, this is perfect for giving your home privacy in a stylish and minamalistic way. Pair alongside wooden blinds or roller blinds to create the ultimate light control in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains.

products.title: Herringbone Black - Roller Blind
products.description: Sometimes all a great interior needs is simplicity. When you want to be able to bring your space to life, the minimalist stylings of herringbone enable you to do exactly that, whilst simultaneously adding a modern twist. The gentle off-white background works in perfect harmony with the definitive black lines to create a look to cherish. If you want to add some geometric patterning to your interior, the secret is not to overdo things.

products.title: Astral Jet - Roller Blind
products.description: The beauty of astral jet is that the neutral backdrop allows the florals to really come into their element. A crisp jet black can be hard to match to, but when it is as elegantly delivered as this, you won't be short of ways that you can make it work. Working in other patterning is a great way to turn the master bedroom into the room that allows you to rest and unwind at the end of a long day. A matching set of bed linen and some wall art opposite your windows would be worth a closer look.

products.title: Floral (Blackout) Noir - Roller Blind
products.description: Floral blackout noir allows you to lose yourself in the summery vibes that we all know and love. With a bold jet black background serving to highlight the natural spread of colours on show, you have everything you need to add two different threads to any existing space in your home. A country chic room wouldn't be complete without a few throws over the back of your cracked leather couches, and a pile of firewood on the hearth.
